## cilium-dbg bpf nat retries flush

Reset the NAT retries histogram

```
cilium-dbg bpf nat retries flush [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for flush
```

      --config string        Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
